channel.title: 525 Changing home
channel.description:
Right now my home place is edgeville and I want to change it to varrock bank.
So that when you die you go to varrock bank and when you teleport home you go to varrock bank, and when you log in on a new account the home is varrock bank..
This is the coords I want and have.
Varrock (Want home) : x: 3185, y: 3492, height : 0
Edgeville (Home at the moment) : x: 3093, y: 3492, height : 0
I want varrock to be the home.

item.title: 525 Changing home
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

its in player java
find public void homTele
and change the coords to what you want
than go to entity.java
and search for your coords that was ur home in edgevill
change to what you want
then open magic…java and search the edgvill coords home
change all of them, there are three in mine

compile.

hope this helps

Read full topic
